attributes.title: Very disappointed
attributes.review: Shortly after downloading this app, my phone started glitching heavily. I didnâ€™t notice the correlation at first but it started freezing, randomly vibrating, and deleting recent messages. I tried deleting the app and when I did the problems stopped. I waited before redownloading it and this time my phone vibrated with a black screen for over an hour and there was absolutely nothing I could do to make it stop. It wasnâ€™t until the battery finally died that I was able to charge my phone, get it to turn on and quickly delete the app once again. And again I stopped having problems. I waited a few more hours and decided I would give it one more shot. Minutes after this third download my phone did the exact same thing, shutting off and vibrating until it finally died. Deleted for the last time I will not be redownloading there is definitely something very suspicious about this app.

attributes.title: Horrible app
attributes.review:
ðŸ‘ðŸ‘„ðŸ‘ I used to be like you. I, a young man, once played online with friends. I once attended a school. I once talked to my friends. I never wanted to go down this road.

It started when my brother downloaded the Devilâ€™s game. I never let him beat me in anything, so naturally, I downloaded it too. It seemed easy at first, tap the screen to get the bird/fish/whateveryouwanttocallit through the big Mario tubes. Then I died. I tapped between the tubes and died. I laughed at first. Iâ€™m far from laughing right now.

I beat my brotherâ€™s high score, but kept going. I wanted to get to 100, Iâ€™ve already created this addiction, Iâ€™ve already made it to 70, so why not? Donâ€™t set a goal. I got 99. 99. My mother has stopped feeding me. I donâ€™t talk to anyone. I sit here and play. Iâ€™ve wet myself countless times not wanting to go to the bathroom and ruin my game. Iâ€™ve threatened to cut the fingers of my relatives off. Iâ€™ve thrown my cat out the window. Iâ€™ve created this addiction. I need help.

I locked myself in the bathroom. Iâ€™m sitting in the bathtub writing this review, warning you NOT to download it. My family doesnâ€™t dare to enter. My brother hasnâ€™t taken a shower in a month.

Iâ€™m cutting my fingers on the sharp edges of my cracked screen, but itâ€™s worth it. A person reading this that doesnâ€™t download this game is a life saved. Donâ€™t end up like me. 

â€œKAREN, AT LEAST LET ME SEE MY KIDS ON CHRISTMASâ€
